source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Sales_Other]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ' SELECT [Asset_ID]\n	,[Asset_Name]\n	,[Asset_Curency]\n	,[Fund_ID]\n	,[Asset_Alloc_Per]\n	,[Asset_country]\n	,[Fund_Region]\n	,[Fund_State]\n	,[Prop_Mgr_Name]\n	,[Prop_Mgr_Company]\n    ,[start_datetime]\n	,[process_name]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Asset_Name,Asset_Curency,Fund_ID,Asset_Alloc_Per,Asset_country,Fund_Region,Fund_State,Prop_Mgr_Name,Prop_Mgr_Company)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Asset_ID,Asset_Name,Asset_Curency,Fund_ID,Asset_Alloc_Per,Asset_country,Fund_Region,Fund_State,Prop_Mgr_Name,Prop_Mgr_Company)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Asset_Name = Asset_Name,
		Relation_Asset_Curency = Asset_Curency,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_Alloc_Per = Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Relation_Asset_country = Asset_country,
		Relation_Fund_Region = Fund_Region,
		Relation_Fund_State = Fund_State,
		Relation_Prop_Mgr_Name = Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Relation_Prop_Mgr_Company = Prop_Mgr_Company,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name = Relation_Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency = Relation_Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per = Relation_Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country = Relation_Asset_country,
		Fund_Region = Relation_Fund_Region,
		Fund_State = Relation_Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name = Relation_Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company = Relation_Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Sales_revenue as string,
		Sales_Cost as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Cost as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSalesOther
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalSalesOther derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Sale_Type_Code,Sales_UOM,Sales_Point,Total_Units_Sold,Sales_revenue,Sales_Cost,Sales_Net_Revenue,Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,Currency_Code,Budget_Sales_Quantity,Budget_Sales_Revenue,Budget_Sales_Cost)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Other_Sale_Id = Other_Sale_Id,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Sale_Type_Code = Sale_Type_Code,
		Relation_Sales_UOM = Sales_UOM,
		Relation_Sales_Point = Sales_Point,
		Relation_Total_Units_Sold = Total_Units_Sold,
		Relation_Sales_revenue = Sales_revenue,
		Relation_Sales_Cost = Sales_Cost,
		Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue = Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit = Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Relation_Currency_Code = Currency_Code,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Revenue = Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Relation_Budget_Sales_Cost = Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Sale_Type_Code,Sales_UOM,Sales_Point,Total_Units_Sold,Sales_revenue,Sales_Cost,Sales_Net_Revenue,Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,Currency_Code,Budget_Sales_Quantity,Budget_Sales_Revenue,Budget_Sales_Cost)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Other_Sale_Id == Relation_Other_Sale_Id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingSalesOther@NewSalesOther select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Other_Sale_Id = toInteger(Other_Sale_Id),
		Total_Units_Sold = toDecimal(Total_Units_Sold, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_revenue = toDecimal(Sales_revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Net_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit = toDecimal(Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Budget_Sales_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDatesAndIdAndNumbers
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum || 
Total_Units_Sold != Relation_Total_Units_Sold || 
Sales_revenue != Relation_Sales_revenue || 
Sales_Cost != Relation_Sales_Cost || 
Sales_Net_Revenue != Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue || 
Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit != Relation_Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit || 
Budget_Sales_Quantity != Relation_Budget_Sales_Quantity || 
Budget_Sales_Revenue != Relation_Budget_Sales_Revenue || 
Budget_Sales_Cost != Relation_Budget_Sales_Cost,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingSalesOther@(NewSalesOther, ChangedSalesOther, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingSalesOther@ChangedSalesOther derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id = Relation_Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Other_Sale_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Other_Sale_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue,
		Sales_Cost,
		Sales_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
ConvertAmountToValidFormat select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = case(greaterOrEqual(toDecimal(Amount),0),'DR','CR'),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2)),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GL_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF)
TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCasfFlowData
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectCasfFlowData, SelectInvalidFundAssetData union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string,
		Debit_Credit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
